thread.title: Salman A
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Salman A

author: Salman A
title: Salman A
text: I hit a curb near Seneca Turnpike and S. Salina. I wanted to creep up to Firestone, or Goodyear or a tire replacement. On the way, I spotted Mavis, but I never considered Mavis because of the name--I'm not used to this area. Well, the tire was replaced in less than 30 minutes. The brand is okay, but I didn't like my current tires anyway, I may end up changing the remaining 3 to the new brand. Customer Service was great too.
